body:
Spack does not have the service pack number as part of the distro version of SUSE Linux Enterprise Server.

Right now:

```
$ spack arch
linux-sles15-zen2
```

But SUSE is bumping glibc [from 2.26 to 2.31 in sp3](https://www.suse.com/releasenotes/x86_64/SUSE-SLES/15-SP3/index.html#jsc-SLE-13756) meaning that we have to reflect that in the triplet for binary caches as os version is a proxy for libc version.

Note that this is not the only issue we have with py-distro, see https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/26762.
title: Spack gets sles15 version wrong
